premise_source_doc_sentence: The National Institute of Dramatic Art  (  NIDA  )  is an Australian national education and training institute for students in the performing arts .

claim: Mel Gibson studied at the National Institute of Dramatic Art.

claim: Mel Gibson studied at the National Institute of Dramatic Art.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Notable institutions for the arts include the UNESCO listed Sydney Opera House , the National Gallery of Victoria , the National Gallery of Australia in Canberra and the National Institute of Dramatic Art in Sydney .

claim: Mel Gibson studied at the National Institute of Dramatic Art.
premise_source_doc_sentence: While a student at the National Institute of Dramatic Art in Sydney , he was given an uncredited role in I Never Promised You a Rose Garden and subsequently appeared as a leading actor in the micro budget surf drama Summer City  (  both in 1977  )  .
